Situated on the hills of Crete-Mades Ligaria, Villa Earth offers an unparalleled exclusive experience.
Enjoy the Cretan Sun and clear blue waters in a high aestheticsâ€™ villa.
Exceptional interiors and exteriors, stone and wood splendidly synthesized.
Luxury private pool, deluxe decoration, and relaxing atmosphere.

reviews.txt: Absolutely charming cabin with stunning views!

name: Beautiful home in Ronneby with kitchen
summary: Welcome to this unique accommodation in the Blekinge archipelago on its own island, StrÃ¶ms Holme, outside Ronneby. The cozy cottage is a paradise for those who like to enjoy their vacations in seclusion and tranquility. In the compact house you will find everything so that you can really enjoy your vacation. The special feature of this beautiful vacation home is the wonderful location with terraces in all four directions, where you can watch the spectacle of the sea, the sunrise and the sunset. In the sea you can fish and swim. There is also a rich bird life and many seals that you can watch. You can either reach the house with your own boat or rent a boat from the house owner. You can park your car in the harbor of EkenÃ¤s, on the mainland. In the harbor there is a nice restaurant and a playground. By boat you can go around the Blekinge archipelago and go ashore on the islands. On HarÃ¶n, enjoy the evening sun until late. On KarÃ¶n you can moor at the jetty and look at the beautiful houses from the turn of the century. You can also take a boat up the river Ronneby and moor at Ronneby Brunnspark for a coffee, restaurant or shopping. The center of Ronneby with its beautiful old wooden houses and many pretty alleys is worth a visit. A unique accommodation in a fantastic location for those who want to enjoy a vacation by the sea, because you can not be closer to the sea. Note: Own risk in case of boat damage. Life jackets can be rented/borrowed at Ronneby Outlet. Can be rented together with S20293 on the neighboring island. Can comfortably fit up to 5 people

reviews.txt: The loft is amazing! Loved the city views.
Perfect location for exploring the city. Modern and clean.

name: The Beachside Bungalow
summary: This Beautiful 1940's Beachfront Bungalow is perfect for that beach side escape. Stunning views of Lacepede Bay from the sheltered verandah. Walking distance to the jetty, supermarket, cafes and pub. The beach is excellent for swimming, fishing and paddle boarding. Short drive to Robe and `The Granites` surf beach.

reviews.txt: Lovely place right by the beach! So relaxing.
Great spot, very clean and well maintained.

name: 2-BR ski apartment in Predela LUX
summary: Exclusive 5*, 2-bedroom apartment in the boutique ski in/ski out complex Predela LUX. Tastefully finished in the highest quality furniture and materials, it fits comfortably up to 4 adults and 2 children, and is conveniently located only few minutes to the main ski road and 5 - 7 minutes to the Gondola. The apartment has fully equipped kitchen, including dishwasher, flat screen TV with over 100 Cable channel. Guests have unlimited access to indoors pool and SPA.

reviews.txt: Amazing location, close to everything!
Very modern and clean. Loved my stay.

name: Villa Adventure -heated pool, media room
summary: Escape to a haven of tranquility and adventure at our stunning 3-bedroom villa in Gata village, an idyllic retreat just 7 km from the vibrant town of OmiÅ¡. This exquisite villa offers the perfect blend of modern luxury and natural beauty, accommodating 6+2 guests in unparalleled comfort and style. Step inside to discover a Media room that will delight both kids and adults, featuring free WiFi, a PlayStation 5 and a table soccer for endless entertainment. The villa boasts a covered outdoor dining area with a barbecue, perfect for al fresco meals amidst the serene surroundings.

reviews.txt: Fantastic penthouse with great amenities!
Loved the views and the luxury feel.

name: Stunning hut in the nature(DayaGeusthouse)
summary: A small traveler's cabin on the border of a nature reserve. measuring 10 square meters and another 10 square meters of balcony. For adventure lovers who like to sleep right in nature, without electricity, with an outdoor kitchen, compost toilets and a hot shower outside under the trees. The cabin is under our house and above it there is an area that is shared with our house and another 2 cabins - where there is a large pool for the summer, a hot tub and a sauna for cold days

reviews.txt: Beautiful cottage with a rustic charm!
Perfect place for a quiet and relaxing stay.

name: Azamra Amirim
summary: Soft sounds of nature, green mountains and caressing wind. It's built as a large open space, with high wooden ceiling and wrapped in windows to the garden. The house is designed in an eclectic style and every detail in it carefully selected. you can cook in a well-equipped kitchen, and dine around a dining table to the sounds of music you like by a professional sound system.facing a mountain view garden, enjoy a wading pool and a magical seating, which are scattered under the shade of trees.

reviews.txt: Amazing lodge in a perfect forest setting!
Great place for a peaceful retreat.

name: Masseria Quadrelli: an oasis in the heart of Salento
summary: Welcome to Masseria Quadrelli: An Oasis of Elegance in the Heart of Salento Located in the heart of Salento, only 10 km from Otranto and a short distance from the renowned towns of Otranto and Santa Cesarea Terme, Masseria Quadrelli is an authentic jewel immersed in a centuries-old olive grove.

reviews.txt: Absolutely loved the loft! Perfect location and beautifully designed.
Stylish loft with everything you need for a comfortable stay.

name: Arabian Nights Ensuite Double Tent with Balcony
summary: My name is Shaker and I would be happy to welcome you to our camp! My family has been in Wadi Rum for many generations and I am born and raised in the surrounding desert. As a guest in our camp you will have the opportunity to learn from our vast knowledge of the land and you will be exposed to the Bedouin culture and our daily lives. Every night we prepare food traditional to the region and cook in an underground oven (Zarb), shared together with other guests in the traditional nomad style.

reviews.txt: Absolutely loved the loft! Perfect location and beautifully designed.
Stylish loft with everything you need for a comfortable stay.

name: Cottage Mauiwikendaya
summary: Aloha! If you feel the pursuit of pleasures, which are considered to be the purpose of man's life and existence, there is Maui Wikendaya Only 10km from Novi Sad on the idyllic part of the Danube River bank, there is a futuristic building Maui Wikendaya. Fairytale family cottage next to the water in which a lot of love and effort is invested will provide you with unforgettable moments of relaxation in nature. Maui Wikendaya will satisfy all hedonists who know how to enjoy life :)

reviews.txt: Absolutely loved the loft! Perfect location and beautifully designed.
Stylish loft with everything you need for a comfortable stay.

name: Cozy Scandinavian Cabin by Mountain River & Woods
summary: Very warm and cozy 4 bedroom cabin on a mountain river in the middle of wild nature. The cabin it's situated in a natural reservation at the foot of the Fagaras mountains, being 1,5 hours away both from Sibiu International Airport and Brasov city and 30 minutes away from Fagaras city. This place is perfect for those who love nature and untamed places. The cabin has been completely remodeled in 2022 and comes with everything you need for a short stay. So, welcome to 'Cabana Sapte'!

reviews.txt: Absolutely loved the loft! Perfect location and beautifully designed.
Stylish loft with everything you need for a comfortable stay.

name: Luxury Beach front
summary: First line to the beach with stunning sea view of 180 degrees! waiting for you this 3 bedrooms dream house, with 24h doorman, parking, pool, spa, Royal Beach hotel service 24h. Just 1 min walking to the beach, 2 min walking to Carmel market, 10 min walking to Neve Zedek. Super luxury

reviews.txt: Incredible cabin with breathtaking views. Loved every moment of our stay!

name: Bungalow with Private Pool
summary: Inspired by the best hotels in the world, this beautiful 150m2 bungalow in the middle of nature has a private swimming pool, two bedrooms with air conditioning, 4K TV, WiFi, bed linen and imported yarn towels, kitchen, minibar 120 liters, brewery, coffee maker with capsules, home-office space, outdoor fireplace, barbecue and a bathroom overlooking the green. Pets are very welcome! The best beaches and waterfalls in the city are located just 15 minutes from the property.

reviews.txt: Amazing apartment with all the amenities you could need. Perfect location.
